ADITI PAUL

NETWORK ENGINEER, PROGRAMMER , ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE ENTHUSIAST

ABOUT ME

Hello, my name is Aditi Paul. I am from New Delhi, India. I currently live in Bangalore, India. I am a network engineer, currently working in Cisco Systems. My journey with networks started with my internship at Cisco Systems. Apart from networks, I am an Artificial intelligence enthusiast and have a keen interest in Machine learning, deep learning and Human Computer Interaction. My ultimate goal is to integrate the spaces of Computer Networks and Artificial intelligence and create self-improving, AI enabled infrastructure.

PROJECTS

Sign Language To Text

Braille to English

Restaurant recommendation system

Weather Prediction system

WORK

I joined Cisco Systems as an intern during my final year of undergrad. Since then, it has been quite a journey! I have explored various products ranging from Cisco Routers, Switches to VoIP applications. During my intership, I cleared several certifications, giving me further depth in different areas. Currently my job requires me to interact with users, network administrators and executives of international companies on a daily basis and fix network outages and failures. Working closely with the largest networks around the world has provided me expertise to manage high workload and handle escalations and highpressure situations! Apart from that, I am involved in the automation projects for digitization of troubleshooting failures in VoIP deployments. Also, a part of Cisco's major Software releases in the voice domain.
